Package com.example.ezvault.utils.camera

Class CameraAction<T,S>

java.lang.Object
com.example.ezvault.utils.camera.CameraAction<T,S>
All Implemented Interfaces:
androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleObserver
Direct Known Subclasses:
GalleryAction
public abstract class CameraAction<T,S> extends Object implements androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver
A class that encapsulates the behaviour of actions related to the camera.
